field_descriptions.define: Define the OSWAP asset and init the AA.
field_descriptions.soft_bounce: In case of error, send tokens back instead of bouncing.
field_descriptions.for: Address of the user whose LP rewards to update.
field_descriptions.group_key: Key of the group where to stake tokens.
field_descriptions.group_key1: Key of the first group whose pool votes are to be redistributed.
field_descriptions.group_key2: Key of the second group whose pool votes are to be redistributed.
field_descriptions.term: Lock tokens for this term (in days).
field_descriptions.vote_shares: Vote for new distribution shares among pools.
field_descriptions.vote_neutral: Vote for neutral position regarding white/blacklisting a pool.
field_descriptions.name: Name of the parameter to change.
field_descriptions.unit: Unit where the proposal was saved.
field_descriptions.min_reserve_tokens: Minimum reserve tokens to receive when selling.
field_descriptions.min_tokens: Minimum tokens to receive when buying.
field_descriptions.hops: The path where to send the output tokens.

meta.project_description: Here you can buy OSWAP token
